translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Triad

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.77. Saraṇaduka, Dassanattika🔽Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Saraṇaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  saraṇa duka dassana ttika  saraṇam dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  saraṇam bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: The Triad on the Refuges, etc.

original: Araṇaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paccayā na araṇaḥ na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With an object that is to be abandoned by vision of the refuges, etc., there is a condition, as proximity condition, for an object that is not to be abandoned by vision of the refuges, etc. As condition being proximity condition, there is one condition, namely, as proximity condition. As condition being prenascence condition, there is one condition, namely, as prenascence condition. As condition being postnascence condition, there is one condition, namely, as postnascence condition. As condition being repetition condition, there is one condition, namely, as repetition condition. As condition being absence condition, there is one condition, namely, as absence condition. As condition being disappearance condition, there is one condition, namely, as disappearance condition. As condition being non-disappearance condition, there is one condition, namely, as non-disappearance condition. As condition being faculty condition, there is one condition, namely, as faculty condition. As condition being jhāna condition, there is one condition, namely, as jhāna condition. As condition being path condition, there is one condition, namely, as path condition. As condition being association condition, there is one condition, namely, as association condition. As condition being dissociation condition, there is one condition, namely, as dissociation condition. As condition being absence condition, there is one condition, namely, as absence condition. As condition being disappearance condition, there is one condition, namely, as disappearance condition. As condition being non-disappearance condition, there is one condition, namely, as non-disappearance condition. As condition being root condition, there is one condition, namely, as root condition. As condition being absence condition, there is one condition, namely, as absence condition. As condition being disappearance condition, there is one condition, namely, as disappearance condition. As condition being non-disappearance condition, there is one condition, namely, as non-disappearance condition. As condition being object condition, there is one condition, namely, as object condition. As condition being decisive-support condition, there is one condition, namely, as decisive-support condition. As condition being proximity condition, there is one condition, namely, as proximity condition. As condition being contiguity condition, there is one condition, namely, as contiguity condition.
